result.eng: I love being outside in the open air.
result.ga: is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.orig: Is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.html: is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aerI love being outside in the open air.
result.ponchtml: is breá liom ḃeiṫ amuiġ faoin aerI love being outside in the open air.

result.eng: The ball is high in the air.
result.ga: tá an liathróid ard san aer
result.orig: Tá an liathróid ard san aer
result.html: tá an liathróid ard san aerThe ball is high in the air.

result.eng: I filled my lungs with the bracing morning air.
result.ga: líon mé mo scamhóga d'aer folláin na maidine
result.orig: Líon mé mo scamhóga d'aer folláin na maidine
result.html: líon mé mo scamhóga d'aer folláin na maidineI filled my lungs with the bracing morning air.
result.ponchtml: líon mé mo scaṁóga d'aer folláin na maidineI filled my lungs with the bracing morning air.

result.eng: I usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.
result.ga: téim ar shiúlóidí fada de ghnáth ag an deireadh seachtaine is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.orig: Téim ar shiúlóidí fada de ghnáth ag an deireadh seachtaine is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.html: téim ar shiúlóidí fada de ghnáth ag an deireadh seachtaine is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aerI usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.
result.ponchtml: téim ar ẛiúlóidí fada de ġnáṫ ag an deireaḋ seaċtaine is breá liom ḃeiṫ amuiġ faoin aerI usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.

result.eng: A light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.
result.ga: d'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíocht
result.orig: D'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíocht
result.html: d'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíochtA light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a ċuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faoḃar ar a cruṫaíoċtA light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.

result.eng: He travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.
result.ga: thaistil sé chun na hafganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta osama bin laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i meiriceá
result.orig: Thaistil sé chun na hAfganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta Osama Bin Laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i Meiriceá
result.html: thaistil sé chun na hafganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta osama bin laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i meiriceáHe travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.
result.ponchtml: ṫaistil sé ċun na hafganastáine i 1999 agus ġlac le hiarratas pearsanta osama bin laden go n-eagróḋ sé ionsaiṫe aeir i meiriceáHe travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.
